name: on_user_documents_blockchain_anchoring
notes: Invokes /functions/v1/anchor-polygon and /anchor-bitcoin via net.http_post; historically used current_setting('app.settings.service_role_key') causing NULL auth

name: update_user_documents_updated_at
callers: Maintains updated_at on user_documents; multiple triggers exist in migrations

name: process-polygon-anchors
callers: cron scheduler -> supabase function process-polygon-anchors; confirms Polygon TXs and appends events[]

name: process-bitcoin-anchors
callers: cron scheduler -> supabase function process-bitcoin-anchors; processes OTS/Bitcoin

name: send-pending-emails
notes: Email worker cron; ensure Resend/MAIL envs set

name: anchor-polygon
callers: Creates anchor record (polygon) and enqueues tx; historically lacked some hash validation; invoked by multiple callers

name: anchor-bitcoin
callers: Creates/queues Bitcoin/OTS anchor; validates 64-hex hash; worker process-bitcoin-anchors does submission/confirmation

name: process-polygon-anchors
callers: Confirmer worker invoked by cron; confirms TX receipts and appends canonical events[]

name: process-bitcoin-anchors
callers: Confirmer worker invoked by cron; batches to OpenTimestamps and verifies confirmations

name: notify-artifact-ready
callers: Used by workers/crons to notify UI/email when artifact ready; validates x-cron-secret header

name: health-check
callers: Provides aggregated cron/anchoring health; callers: dashboards/ops

name: signnow-webhook
callers: Webhook from SignNow that calls anchor functions; ensure auth/validation

name: process-signature
callers: Part of workflow; invokes anchors after processing a signature

name: legacy_anchor-polygon
callers: Deprecated duplicate of anchor-polygon; keep for reference

name: legacy_process-polygon-anchors
callers: Deprecated duplicate worker; exists for compatibility

name: _shared/cors
callers: Shared CORS helper used by many edge functions; ALLOWED_ORIGIN and SITE_URL envs important to avoid browser blocks

name: _shared/anchorHelper.example
callers: Examples for anchor flow and worker patterns; useful for refactor to executor
